price: 6. Inaad u digto qolo aan aabbayaashood loo digin, ee iyagu ah kuwo dhoohan.
arabic: لِتُنذِرَ قَوۡمٗا مَّآ أُنذِرَ ءَابَآؤُهُمۡ فَهُمۡ غَٰفِلُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: litundhira qawman mā undhira ābāuhum fahum ghāfilūna
